ee itipandama niweyi.yali dalwimedi perata wada hondin aalokamathwe.yali yali niwuna witakadi ese dalwa dalwa gamana yathma hiru udaweyi.ewita iti pandama iwathala hirueliyen gamana yayi.ee siduwim pela dibbachakkhuwa upadawa ganimedi sidukarana kri yawaliyata samanaya.mulinprapakruthi asata aramunuwana thek manaye patan anukrimayen durabahara darshanadiya balimata yomu wiya yuthuya.ee darshana prukruthi asatada pratakata wethath parikarma sithata wada hondin prabakatawe.mese darshana nimiththa menehi karathma dan dibbachakkhu dhathuwa udinne yayi kiwayuthu awasthawa wethata elambaeyi.ehidi ee darshana atharin kisiyam darshanak aramunukara manodwarawarjanaya upadiyi.eya niruddha wethma parikarma upachara anuloma gothrbhu sith ipida chathuththija dhyalana arpanawa upadiyi.ee arpana sithe pawathina prathagnyawa dibbachakkhu dhathuwayi.eya shakthimath kirimata nam thama awata athi parisaraya kotas kara salaka mema sthanawala athi darshana dakimata hakiyawa labewayayi salaka senti mitarayak, mitarayak, kilomitarayak aadi washayen duraprawamanawala athi da narambaimata uthsaha kala yuthuya.ewita langa thibena de penennak men dura, itha dura ha boho durabahara thibena dewal pawa hondin darshanayawe.me ayurinma biththi,pradakara,parwatha aadi dewalin aawaranayawi athi wiwidha darshana pawa balimata awadhanaya yomukara uthsaha kalayuthuya.ese kirimedi anukradamika lesa eewada darshanaya wimata patan ganiyi.esema wiwidha dishawala athi darshana wena wenama dakimata wayam kala yuthuya.
